menial.translation[0].definitions[0].def: menial work is boring, needs no skill, and is not important
menial.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She did menial tasks about the house.
menial.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who does menial work, especially a servant in a house
menial.translation[2].definitions[0].def: menial work needs little skill and is badly paid
menial.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: He worked his way through college by taking menial jobs in the vacation.
